rukus.text: vy ne zdiysnyuyete shcho kozhnyy u nebi ta zemli glorifies BOH, navitʹ ptakhy tomu shcho vony letyatʹ u koloni? Kozhnyy znaye yoho molytvu ta yoho glorification. BOH znaye tsilkom vse vony
Do BOHA nalezhytʹ suverenitetu neba ta zemli, ta do BOHA yavlyaye soboyu zaklyuchnu dolyu

vy ne zdiysnyuyete shcho BOH vede khmary, todi zbyraye yikh razom, todi nahromadzhuye yikh na odyn odnoho, todi vy bachyte , shcho doshch vytikayete z nykh? Vin posylaye vnyz z vantazhiv neba snihu nakryty whomever Vin wills, toy chas, yak vidvodyachy yomu z whomever Vin wills. brightness snizhnykh mayzhe zavisok ochi
BOH kontrolyuye nich ta denʹ. Tse povynno buty urok dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ ochamy

Ta BOH utvoryv kozhnyy zhyvyy vytvir z vody. Deyakyy z nykh hulyayutʹ na yikhnikh shlunkakh, deyakiy prohulyantsi na dvokh nohakh, ta deyakiy prohulyantsi na chotyrʹokh. BOH stvoryuye shchob ni Vin wills. BOH Omnipotent
My poslaly vnyz do vas roz'yasnyayuchi vidkryttya, todi BOH keruye whoever wills (shchob keruvatysya) u pryamomu shlyakhu
Yak kazhutʹ, "My virymo v BOHU ta u kur'yeri, ta my pidkoryayemosʹ," ale todi deyakyy z nykh kovzayemo nazad piznishe. Tse - ne viruyuchi
Koly vony zaproshuyutʹsya do BOHA ta Yoho kur'yera pryymaty rishennya sered nykh, deyakykh z nykh pryyizhdzhayutʹ perekynuti
Ale, yakshcho vyrok ye u yikhniy prykhylʹnosti, vony lehko vyznayutʹ tse
tam khvoroba u yikhnikh serdenʹkakh? Vony doubtful? Vony shcho BOH ta Yoho kur'yer boyatʹsya mozhe obrobyty yikh nespravedlyvo? Faktychno, tse - vony shcho unjust
